price: Dales a los creyentes la albricia de que recibirán un inmenso favor de Dios.
arabic: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَضۡلٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wabashiri al-mu'minīna bi-anna lahum mina al-lahi faḍlan kabīran
